single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch decrease single_crochet decrease insert hook into st and draw up a loop insert hook into next st and draw up a loop yarn over draw through all 3 loops on hook invdec invisible decrease like a regular decrease decrease but work through the front loops only insert hook into front loop only of next stitch and draw up a loop insert hook into front loop only of next stitch and draw up a loop yarn over and pull through all 3 loops on hook makes your decreases prettier magic_ring / loop i start all my amigurumi s with an adjustable loop as opposed to working into a chained stitch you can tighten this loop so that there is no hole in the center of your work if you are unfamiliar with this just google crochet tutorial adjustable loop here are 3 tutorial sources that are each just as good as the other magic_ring tutorial at stitch diva http //www stitchdiva com/custom aspx id=54 at crochetme http //crochetme com/dec_jan_0405/reads_round html at planet june for right handed craftsters http //www planetjune com/blog/tutorials/magic-ring-right-handed/ and for left handed craftsters http //www planetjune com/blog/tutorials/magic-ring-left-handed/ notes 1 all rounds are worked continuously in a spiral do not join or turn at the end of row 2 to help keep track of your stitches instead of counting it may be helpful to place a stitch marker at the beginning of each round 3 to change color work last stitch of old color to last yarn over yarn over with new color and draw through all loops on hook to complete stitch ©heliinä swerdlyk www heliina com please note that this project contains small parts that are not suitable for small children it s not meant as a toy for babies or small children head
